name: GoDaddy AnyCA REST plugin
description: GoDaddy plugin for the AnyCA Gateway framework

ca_plugin_config.name: ApiKey
ca_plugin_config.description: The API Key for the GoDaddy API

ca_plugin_config.name: ApiSecret
ca_plugin_config.description: The API Secret for the GoDaddy API

ca_plugin_config.name: BaseUrl
ca_plugin_config.description: The Base URL for the GoDaddy API - Usually either https://api.godaddy.com or https://api.ote-godaddy.com

ca_plugin_config.name: ShopperId
ca_plugin_config.description: The Shopper ID of the GoDaddy account to use for the API calls (ex: 1234567890) - has a max length of 10 digits

ca_plugin_config.name: Enabled
ca_plugin_config.description: Flag to Enable or Disable gateway functionality. Disabling is primarily used to allow creation of the CA prior to configuration information being available.

enrollment_config.name: JobTitle
enrollment_config.description: The job title of the certificate requestor

enrollment_config.name: CertificateValidityInYears
enrollment_config.description: Number of years the certificate will be valid for

enrollment_config.name: LastName
enrollment_config.description: Last name of the certificate requestor

enrollment_config.name: FirstName
enrollment_config.description: First name of the certificate requestor

enrollment_config.name: SlotSize
enrollment_config.description: Maximum number of SANs that a certificate may have - valid values are [FIVE, TEN, FIFTEEN, TWENTY, THIRTY, FOURTY, FIFTY, ONE_HUNDRED]

enrollment_config.name: OrganizationName
enrollment_config.description: Name of the organization to be validated against

enrollment_config.name: OrganizationAddress
enrollment_config.description: Address of the organization to be validated against

enrollment_config.name: OrganizationCity
enrollment_config.description: City of the organization to be validated against

enrollment_config.name: OrganizationState
enrollment_config.description: Full state name of the organization to be validated against

enrollment_config.name: OrganizationCountry
enrollment_config.description: 2 character abbreviation of the country of the organization to be validated against

enrollment_config.name: OrganizationPhone
enrollment_config.description: Phone number of the organization to be validated against

enrollment_config.name: RegistrationAgent
enrollment_config.description: Registration agent name assigned to the organization when its documents were filed for registration

enrollment_config.name: RegistrationNumber
enrollment_config.description: Registration number assigned to the organization when its documents were filed for registration

enrollment_config.name: RootCAType
enrollment_config.description: The certificate's root CA - Depending on certificate expiration date, SHA_1 not be allowed. Will default to SHA_2 if expiration date exceeds sha1 allowed date. Options are GODADDY_SHA_1, GODADDY_SHA_2, STARFIELD_SHA_1, or STARFIELD_SHA_2.
